reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Scoping study assessing opportunities for the global Future Cities programme across ODA eligible 10 middle income countries

description.narrative: The Global Future Cities Prosperity Fund programme will carry out targeted interventions in selected cities to encourage sustainable development, and increase prosperity whilst alleviating high levels of city poverty. Scoping for the programme looked at opportunities where sector capabilities of the UK government, civil society, academia and business are able to respond and successfully implement investment opportunities arising in ODA eligible, middle income countries.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
